metadata.title: CVE-2017-6842 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The ColorChanger::GetColorFromStack function in colorchanger.cpp in PoDoFo0.9.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointerdereference) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
